tool_description: Analyzes storage usage patterns and provides recommendations for optimizing media asset storage costs and performance.

analysis_scope.description: Scope of analysis: account_wide, product_category, or asset_type

category_filter.description: Product category to analyze if scope is product_category

asset_type_filter.description: Asset type to analyze if scope is asset_type

time_period_days.description: Number of days of usage data to analyze

include_cost_analysis.description: Whether to include storage cost analysis

error_messages: Invalid analysis scope: analysis_scope must be one of [account_wide, product_category, asset_type].
Missing filter parameter: category_filter required when scope is product_category.
Missing filter parameter: asset_type_filter required when scope is asset_type.
Invalid time period: time_period_days must be between 1 and 365.
Analysis failed: Storage optimization analysis could not be completed - check data availability.
usage: Choose analysis scope and provide required filter parameters. Adjust time period for historical analysis depth.

storage_cost_monthly.description: Estimated monthly storage cost in dollars

unused_assets_count.description: Number of assets not used in the analysis period

duplicate_assets_count.description: Number of potential duplicate assets identified

potential_savings.description: Estimated monthly cost savings from optimization in dollars
